function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Human-to-human transmission through droplets, aerosols, and direct contact","Impact":"Spread of the virus within a built environment, leading to increased cases and potential outbreaks","Mitigation":"Implementing social distancing measures, mask-wearing, and hand hygiene protocols","Technologies":"Air filtration and purification systems, UV disinfection, contactless technologies","People":"General public, healthcare workers, support staff, visitors","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, building management, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Inhalation of aerosols containing pathogens","Impact":"Increased risk of infection, especially in enclosed areas with poor ventilation","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation, implementing air filtration systems, reducing occupancy, wearing masks","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air purifiers, ventilation monitoring systems","People":"Occupants, visitors, support staff","Owner":"Building management, employers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Transmission through direct or indirect contact with infected people or contaminated surfaces","Impact":"Potential spread of the virus through physical contact and surface contamination","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and disinfection of high-touch surfaces, promoting hand hygiene practices","Technologies":"Disinfection technologies, antimicrobial surfaces, touchless systems","People":"General public, support staff, visitors","Owner":"Building management, employers, public health authorities"}]}
